text: @realDonaldTrump Don't be distracted. Before Trump shit the bed on #COVID19 and had protestors gassed for a photo op to compensate for hiding in a bunker, he colluded with Russia to gain the WH and hid the evidence and he extorted an ally for dirt on a political opponent.
